name: Svilia
startIntroPart1: Svilia is a nation defined by it's unyielding commitment to unity, order, and centralized power. Born from decades of oppression by the Naveil Empire, it emerged through revolution and reconstruction as a tightly controlled state, where loyalty to The Collective outweighs all else. Scarred by occupation and oppression, Svilia rejects fragmentation of all forms, and rises from the remains of the empire that had oppressed them for so long.
declaringWar: By order of The Collective and in accordance with our directives of national preservation, we hereby declare war on your nation. Your continued deviation from cooperative protocols have been deemed intolerable. Compliance was requested. Resistance was chosen. Order will now be imposed.
attacked: So be it. The Collective endures.
defeated: Structure may fall. Order does not.
introduction: Salutations from The Collective. Compliance will be expected. Obey or face the wrath of our superior nation.
hateHello: Your presence offends The Collective. Do not tread farther or face the consequences.
afterPeace: We will meet again. For now, Peace has been achieved.
uniques: May buy [All] units for [0] [Culture] [in all cities]
All newly-trained [All] units [in all cities] receive the [Immortal] promotion
